page.title: 03The M1 Motorway
page.content:
The M1 goes through the middle of our survey area.The M1 was started in l959 and completed in 1968.The M42 and the A38 will join the M1 in our area n the next 10 years. We went onto the motorway bridge and counted the traffic in each lane for 20 minutes.The results were<numbers of vehicles>: Southbound Northbound Fast lane 94 97 Middle lane 161 173 Slow lane 226 179
This means that there would be 2790 vehicles per hour or about 66960 vehicles per day.The M1 is a very busy road.Traffic is only allowed in certain lanes such as lorries are not allowed in the fst lanes.
